com.madrobot.io.net
Class CarrierHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.madrobot.io.net.CarrierHelper

public final class CarrierHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to find out the current carrier type used by the device. (i.e) Wifi or 3G

It implements a dynamic broadcast listener that receives carrier information as and when it changes.
Usage:

 android.content.Context context= //current app context
 CarrierHelper carrier=CarrierHelper.getInstance(context);
 CarrierHelper.Carrier current=carrier.getCurrentCarrier();
 if(current!=null){
  //network operations can be performed.
 }

Author:
Elton Kent

Method Detail

getInstance

public static CarrierHelper getInstance(Context context)
The BearerHandler is the primary access point to initialize bearer handler. Only static access is followed, since only one instance of the service handler will be created

Parameters:
context - application context
Returns:
return shared instance of CarrierHelper

public void setWifiDisabled()
